duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain the highest quality of care and patient advocacy in an evidence-based nursing environment.
Collaborate with healthcare teams to develop and update individualized care plans and manage care delivery.
Ensure timely implementation of physician orders and integrate patient care standards in all clinical activities.
Promote a supportive and team-oriented environment that aligns with the hospital's mission, vision, and values.

education_certification.credential: BSN from an accredited school of nursing required, 1+ years’ of acute care experience, NYS RN license and registration, BLS certification, HCAHPS/EPIC knowledge preferred
